p: MÄ…czka et al. [ 28] collected data on potential therapeutic value of geraniol, very famous fragrance component in cosmetics with rose-like aroma. It possesses antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and anticancer activity. Special attention was devoted to anti-cancer and antimicrobial activity of this compound. The authors underline the low toxicity and high anti-cancer potential of this compound in dangerous cancers (prostate, bowel, liver, kidney, and skin cancer).
